title: Having issues Patching 7.10? Click Here!
body:
Hailing on all frequencies!!!

Trapped by patching issues? Keep calm and have a spot of tea, just like Cait here.

http://i.imgur.com/NemHJca.gifv

Don’t stay stuck in the past! If you're in need of troubleshooting, we have our ace in a hole to help take take 'em down! Check out these steps, or post below!

------------------------------------------------

> Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy
>

 We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004
>

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003
>

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body:
Hey guys,

I wanted to give a heads up that we have a [pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2aNwwPQY-5232017-older-macs-unable-to-launch-league) regarding launch issues for some mac players.  As we investigate further, we found that players on 2007 Macs or older hardware are the most impacted by this.  We need your help to get more info so we can resolve this as fast as we can.

If you are on a 2007 Mac or older and unable to launch League, grab the following logs to help:

- Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain a set of logs.  
- You'll also want to submit a [System Report](https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT203001) as well.
- Attach these logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I wanted to make sure you guys saw this, and we appreciate the assist!  We'll be posting updates as they come in the pinned thread.

I just updated lol (on Mac) everything was fine and when it finished, it disappeared like normal except it didn't re-open after. So I clicked the app so it would open, but nothing happened.... I kept trying but nothing is opening! I even restarted my computer but it still won't open and I have no idea why! Please help

Also, on Mac (el capitan), and having the same issue. after the newest client patch it crashes during startup and won't load. rebooted multiple times, clean reinstalled multiple times, now i have the old school "League Patcher" and that'll load, but when i click launch to get to the client it crashes and shows nothing.
Ive been having the same exact problem, i feel you bro, except I'm on Yosemite not El Capitan
Agreed. Mac, El Capitan. Same problem here. Click on launch, nothing happens.
me 3

If this issue is still happening for you, help us rule out some possibilities!  The specific issue you're reporting here can happen if your network fails to reach our services, so nothing comes up.  Go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure nothing is blocking your path, enabling your network to establish comms with us.  Let me know the results.

Mac user here, On El Capitan. Same issues as  the others. League will not open after the new launcher attempts to patch. Clicking the orange "Launch" icon after the first window appears to download the latest patch, results in no loading of the game at all. have been through connection settings and disk permissions. I am an experienced Mac and PC user. This is clearly a client issue! Riot please fix for us mac users asap. I am a loyal subject and will deal with this brutal downtime like a man.
Riot please fix the issues on Mac. It seems every Mac user is having a problem with the new update.

I turned on my mac to update to patch 7.10 so I clicked restart to update now. After the downloading of the pre-patch that is only 60 mb I can't remember exactly, the client suddenly disappeared(which normally the client should re-open to complete the full patch). So I tried clicking on the LoL icon and it only shows "League of Legends quit unexpectedly" every time. It did not even complete the patch. My mac is 10.7.5 by the way. Help please :({{item:3070}}
my lol (on Mac) won't open either... just bounces once in the dock
After the patch, when joining a game it does not go fullscreen, even though I've chosen it in the settings the taskbar is still visible and is interupting the game experience.

What's your screen resolution set to via your in-game video settings?  It might be set to Windowed instead of Fullscreen, though, you may also be able to toggle that by pressing Alt+Enter while in-game.  Let me know if those steps help.
I tried changing the resoultion, nothing happened, even switched from Fullscreen to Windowed and then back agained. Nothing is working.
